extension.name: Profile Completion Status
extension.author: Team Joomlaxi
extension.description: This plugin Shows Profile Completion Status for JomSocial. You required to install JomSocial and ProfileCompletion to get this working.

field.name: coreapp
field.label: Core Application
field.description: Causes this application to not appear in the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin

field.name: position
field.label: Position
field.description: Default position if you select this as core apps

field.name: showProfile
field.label: Show Plugin when 100% Status
field.description: Do you want to show Plugin when user's Profile is 100% complete?

field.name: SPS_VisibleFeatureNumber
field.label: Number of Visible Feature to complete Profile
field.description: Write All to display all feature else write count
